title: Butterscotch Bread Pudding
ingredients: ['1 300g loaf day-old bread, torn into small pieces', '1L milk', '100g caster sugar', '125g butter, melted', '3 eggs, beaten', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', 'Butterscotch topping', '300g dark brown soft sugar', '8 tablespoons golden syrup', '400ml water']
